features.featureTitle: Add a 'Share Our Site' section or modal accessible from the site (e.g., a button in the Header or Footer) that displays a generated QR code image pointing to the Kare2U website URL, along with the full shareable URL as copyable text and a 'Copy Link' button that copies the URL to the clipboard. Style it using the Kare2U brand palette (light blue, soft green, white) with rounded corners and a clean layout.
